usefulItems: large baking tray, baking paper, round pastry cutter (Ø 7 cm), rolling pin, pastry brush, oven
title: Peach and Lavender Tartlets

ingredients.content: 150 g plain flour, plus extra for dusting

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C and line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Place flour, butter, water and salt in mixing bowl then mix <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>. Tip out onto a lightly floured surface.
Roll out using a rolling pin to a thickness of 5 mm then use a fluted pastry cutter (Ø 7 cm) to cut out 10 discs. Clean mixing bowl.
Place ground almonds and brown sugar in mixing bowl then mix <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Spread evenly over pastry discs and arrange sliced peaches on top.
Brush lavender honey over peaches using a pastry brush then bake for 20-25 minutes (180°C) until golden and peaches are cooked. Serve warm or cold.
